ValidationRule.description: Only product support manager can update this field
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (ISCHANGED(Expected_Update_Period__c )) && ($UserRole.Name <> 'GTO PSE 6A' && $UserRole.Name <> 'GTO PSE 6B' && $UserRole.Name <> 'GTO PSE 6C' && $UserRole.Name <> 'GTO PSE 6D' && $UserRole.Name <> 'GTO PSE 6E' && $UserRole.Name <> 'GTO PSE 6F' && $UserRole.Name <>'GTO PSE 6G' && $UserRole.Name <>'GTO PSE 6H' && $UserRole.Name <>'GTO PSE 6I' && $UserRole.Name <> 'GTO PSE 6J')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Field is only modifiable by a Product Support Manager
